firstLevel.name: Rage
firstLevel.description: In battle, you fight with primal ferocity. On your turn, you can enter a rage as a bonus action... (et al).

secondLevel.name: Reckless Attack
secondLevel.description: Starting at second level, you can throw aside all concern ... (et al).

secondLevel.name: Danger Sense
secondLevel.description: At second level, you gain an uncanny sense of when things nearby aren't as they should be, (et al)...

thirdLevel.name: Primal Path (Archetype Choice)
thirdLevel.description: At third level, you choose a path that shapes the nature of your rage. (et al)
